description: {"blocks":[{"key":"adhdb","text":"Preparation of soluble and insoluble mitochondrial protein fractions from HeLa cells for mass spectrometry","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"6fhfj","text":"Thaw mitochondrial stocks on ice, and aliquot out one tube of   of mitochondria for each sample.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":62,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"fgahf","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"60","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":4}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"14aob","text":"Centrifuge samples at 10,000x rcf for   at 4 deg C, and carefully aspirate the supernatant ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":38,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"5ovmp","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":600,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"goel","text":"Add   of ice cold 0.5% TX-100 in PBS, vortex each sample for ~5 seconds, and leave samples to incubate on ice for 15 min. At the conclusion of the   lysis incubation, vortex each sample for ~5 sec again. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":147,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"5vfe6","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"60","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":900,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"94ign","text":"Centrifuge the samples at 12,000x rcf for   at 4 deg C","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":42,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"8qd8c","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":600,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"f8lo9","text":"Using a pipette, carefully remove   of the supernatant (representing 95% of the lysis volume) and place this sample into a clean microfuge tube on ice, being sure not to disturb any pellets that have formed on the bottom of the tube. The volume removed represents the ‘soluble’ protein fraction. The tube containing the pellet represents the ‘insoluble’ protein fraction. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":34,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"d48lu","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"57","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1pn4k","text":"Add   of 0.5% TX-100 in PBS to each insoluble protein fraction by pipetting on the side of the tube. Gently flick each tube to rinse the sides of the tube. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"7m8tf","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"57","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7g658","text":"Centrifuge the insoluble protein fractions at 12,000x rcf for   at 4 deg C.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":62,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"73i9h","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":600,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"10pbl","text":"Using a pipette, carefully remove   of the supernatant from the insoluble protein fraction, and place into a clean microfuge tube (which will function as the waste collection tube for all samples).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":34,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"4cpek","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"57","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"68iq1","text":"Repeat steps 6 – 8, which will total 2 washes","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"b1p6e","text":"Repeat step 6. You should now have two tubes for each sample (soluble and insoluble protein fractions), and one waste tube. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"b1mc0","text":"Thaw aliquots of recombinant Ag85A on ice, and add 180 ng of Ag85A to each insoluble protein fraction, and   of Ag85A to each soluble fraction","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":107,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"b241u","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"171","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":8}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"a7mjh","text":"Equilibrate all samples to room temperature and then add 2x SDS solubilization buffer to a final concentration of 1x (2x: 10% w/v SDS, 200 mM HEPES pH 8.5). Vortex each samples for ~ 5 seconds to mix. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4mlqn","text":"Sonicate all samples in a waterbath sonicator set to ~21 deg C for  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":67,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"etu6r","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":600,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fnaud","text":"Add TCEP to a final concentration of 10 mM and chloroacetamide to a final concentration of 40 mM to each sample, vortex each sample for ~5 seconds to mix, and incubate samples at 37 deg C for   (standing). NOTE: make sure chloroacetamide is made up fresh from powder","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":192,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"8c7rb","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":2700,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fjdn7","text":"Acidify each sample by adding phosphoric acid to a final concentration of 1.2%/sample (ensure pH \u003c4. More phosphoric acid can be added if the pH is not low enough at 1.2%/sample)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"50m4b","text":"Add binding buffer (100 mM triethylammonium bicarbonate, 90% v/v methanol pH 7.1 with phosphoric acid) to each sample at a ratio of 1:7, sample volume to binding buffer. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"3ent7","text":"Vortex each sample for ~5 sec to mix ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5r2fa","text":"Load   of each sample into a S-Trap Mini column, and centrifuge at 6,500x rcf at room temperature for 30 sec. Discard the flow through.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":5,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"gfd5","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"400","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bvqb7","text":"Repeat step 18 until the full volume of each sample has been loaded on its column.  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6uj91","text":"Wash each column by adding   of binding buffer, centrifuging at 6,500x rcf at room temperature for  , and discarding the flow through.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":27,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":99,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"ctnic","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"400","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":30,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"7tlnt","text":"Repeat step 20 three times, for a total of 4 washes. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"123n6","text":"Move the columns to a 1.5 mL LoBind microfuge tube (Eppendorf) and add   of digestion buffer directly to the column filter (digestion buffer: 50 mM triethylammonium bicarbonate supplemented with sequencing grade trypsin at a concentration of 1 ug trypsin to 50 ug of starting protein (which will differ between soluble and insoluble samples)). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":71,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"8l28b","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"125","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"e96n","text":"Centrifuge samples at 1000x rcf for   at room temperature, and pipette the digestion buffer flow through directly back onto the column filter. Move the columns to clean 2.0 mL LoBind microfuge tubes. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":36,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"2q8k4","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":30,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4vskm","text":"Seal each sample to the LoBind microfuge tube with parafilm, and incubate samples overnight for at least   at 37 deg C (static incubation)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":105,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"91vmg","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":57600,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"46kku","text":"Remove the parafilm and add   of digestion buffer without trypsin (50 mM triethylammonium bicarbonate) to each sample. Centrifuge samples at 3,200x rcf for   at room temperature. Leave the flow through in the collection tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":28,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":156,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"4rnqq","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"80","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":60,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"759p3","text":"Add   of 0.2% v/v formic acid to each sample, and centrifuge at 3,200x rcf for   at room temperature. Leave the flow through in the collection tube. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":79,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"12rng","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"80","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":60,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bogvj","text":"Add   of 50% v/v acetonitrile/0.2% v/v formic acid to each sample, and centrifuge at 6,500x rcf for  . ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":100,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"9927m","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"80","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":60,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"9ilb8","text":"Remove and discard the S-Trap columns from each sample. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5p1hi","text":"Lyophilise the total eluate from each sample, seal the samples with parafilm and store at -80 deg C until needed for downstream processing.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
